com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messenger
Class MessageTest

java.lang.Object
  com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messenger.MessageTest

public class MessageTest
extends java.lang.Object

Test runner for Messages Instantiating the class will create three test controllers. The controllers are subscribed to a subset of three messages Executing the sendMessageX method will send that message to the controllers. Those that subscribe to that message will fire that controller's notify method

Version:
2014-09-30
Author:
Roger Jaffe

Constructor Summary
MessageTest()
          Constructor for the MessageTest class which will subscribe the three controllers to a subset of the three messages

 void sendMessage1()
          Send message 1 to the controllers that have subscribed to it

          Send message 2 to the controllers that have subscribed to it

          Send message 3 to the controllers that have subscribed to it
 void sendMessage4()
          Send message 4 to the controllers that have subscribed to it
 void setMessageWithData()
          Send message 2 to the controllers that have subscribed to it along with a data packet of class MessageData.
